sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import s from '../StyleSheets/Card.module.css'; import style from '../StyleSheets/Detail.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Card({ clouds, wind, max, min, name, img, onClose, latitud, longitud, temp, weather }) { const [modal, setModal] = useState({ clima: false, }) let handleModal = (e) => { switch (e.target.name) { case "clima": return setModal({ ...modal, clima: !modal.clima }) case "close": return setModal({ clima: false, }) default: return modal } } return (

{name}

Min: {min}°

Max: {max}°

{ modal.clima === true ?

{name}

Temperatura: {temp} ºC
Clima: {weather}
Viento: {wind} km/h
Cantidad de nubes: {clouds}
Latitud: {latitud}º
Longitud: {longitud}º
: null }
) };
